name: SquashOn - 2D Platformer
description:
Thank you friend We are very glad that you visited this page.
This game tells about the stories of the protagonist ... who must go through all the levels to get to his offender and restore justice.

Squash On is a crazy platform game that focuses on the speed of passing levels, for this purpose the levels were made short but requiring maximum concentration on the part of the player. This game does not have super diverse animations and level design, everything here is sharpened for strong minimalism so as not to distract the player from the main mechanics

Game For Google Play Market

Game mechanics:

You play a 2D game as the main character, who can move at crazy speeds climbing walls and pushing off them - an analogy of this mechanic can be drawn with the game Super Meat Boy. This gives you complete freedom of movement limited to only two dimensions x, y

Plot:
The game begins with a story about what happened to the main character and who his enemy is, by the end of the last level, the story of how he took revenge on his offender will be told

Life:
There is no life system in the game, when you die, you reappear at the beginning of the level, this is due to the shortness of the level and the speed of its completion

Sounds:
The game has both the sounds of collisions and movements and background music in each level

Ranking System:
The game has a rating system for players, the rating is awarded for completing each level and for the best time to complete the level among all players

Feedback:
For all questions, you can contact the email: squashon.game@gmail.com

P.S.
To get all the features of the game you need a pre-installed application Play Games
